group.headline: Unofficial GMOD Steam group!
group.summary:
We like building stuff. Some of us like destroying it. Some of us like destroying things others created. Some of us like to laugh at the others whose things got ravaged just to cry shortly after since our own creations are on the ground burning up in ashes. Some of us like banning both parties from the same playing field. And a select few of us are locked away in their basements coding tools in a weird moon computer language.
No matter who you are, you'll fit in good. It's a world of possibilities, assholes and unstable Windows dedicated servers out there, and you have to be part of it. If not you can just add baloons to airboats.


Plus it contributes to the income of some random British guy (and his team of coding monkeys). Can you name one thing about that last sentance that just didn't feel right to you?
Join today, and feel the burn tomorrow!

group.headline: Welcome To UKCS
group.summary:
UKCS: "United Kingdom Community Servers". A relaxed and fun loving community with servers running on the very best hardware available. For more information on UKCS visit our website at www.ukcs.net. UKCS has 4 CS:S Servers, 5 DoD:S Servers, 8 TF2 servers, 3 L4D Servers, 3 L4D2 Servers and a 1.6 Server. All run the Unique UKCS Server Mod. Our player's motto is "Once you've played on UKCS - you've found a second home".

group.headline: Who the hell is Doorman?
group.summary:
Welcome to the =DiG= Steam Community!

If you've been invited, it doesn't mean that you are in our clan. The invitation is just for our community, so please don't wear our tags without permission. If you do, we will promptly ban you .

We have many different servers ranging from (but not limited to) TF2, 2142, L4D2, COD5, COD4, ZPS, and Crysis. In total we have around 22 servers, all ranked and all have stats recording.

We are primarly a US based clan, but have many members from other countries (namely Canada and the UK). We have around 350 clan members, and at any given time around 50 recruits. The average age of members in =DiG= is mid 20's.

The primary focus of our Steam Community is TF2, L4D2, and Source Mods (ZPS), but we do have other game servers supported by Steam (COD5), and will expand accordingly to our community's interests.

We also have a huge faction of the clan that play non-Steam games (2142 and Crysis). But since Steam (or the Steam Community) does not support these games, we will not discuss those games in great detail. If interested in our non-Steam games servers, please visit our website and forums.

Feel free to have fun, and even fuck around, but don't go so far as to mess up the gameplay or level of enjoyment of others. Bottom line, don't be a fucking jackass and you'll be fine.

We are now recruiting for all games! For more details on how to become a recruit, please fill out a Recruit App (the link is below).

So, have fun, play some games, and don't take anything too seriously. I promise you, none of us are really that important.

*********************************************

group.headline: The Teamwork Movement (TWM) aims to bring teamwork oriented players together for the best gaming experience possible.
group.summary:
The Teamwork Movement (TWM) is not a clan, it's an open group of players that anyone can join, as long as they're interested in utilizing teamwork while gaming. TWM participants are encouraged, but not required, to add <TWM> to the end of their name and play on TWM endorsed servers. By adding TWM to the end of your name you're easily recognizable by other TWM participants, so they can engage in teamwork with you; and by playing on TWM endorsed servers you are much more likely to encounter other TWM participants, and have the best gaming experience as a result.

While we encourage TWM members to engage in teamwork regardless of what server they play on, we maintain a list of recommended servers which TWM players frequent. By playing on TWM endorsed servers you are much more likely to play with other TWM participants, resulting in the best gaming experience possible. All TWM endorsed servers go through a rigorous approval process that ensures they are lag-free, popular and well administered. You can find the most up to date list of TWM endorsed servers at the following link:

http://www.theTWM.com/

In addition to the endorsed server list we regularly use the Steam event system to send out notifications of TWM events. Several times throughout the day we'll issue an event alert with a TWM endorsed server's IP, by joining in on those games you get to join a server filled entirely with TWM players -- you'll experience teamwork like you've never experienced before.

So, to recap, all you need to do is (all of these are optional):
- Add <TWM> to the end of your name.
- Play on TWM endorsed servers so you can easily find other teamwork oriented players. The IP for TWM endorsed servers can be found at the "TWM Endorsed Server List" link below.
- Engage in teamwork whenever possible!

Frag on!
Vgames TF2 community, Israely server hosted by Vgames.co.il

group.headline: Libet Tibet
group.summary:
This group is made in honor of the hundreds of thousands of Tibetans that have died at the hands of the Chinese government.

這個小組的建立, 是為了紀念成千上萬個被中國政府殺害的西藏人而設的。

このグループは中国の政府のせいで死んだ数十万人のチベット人を記念してなされる。

이 그룹은 중국 정부의 손에 죽은 수천 수백 티베트인에게 경의를 표하여 한다.

Diese Gruppe enstand zu Ehren der hunderttausenden toten Tibeter, die unter der Hand der chinesischen Besatzer starben.

Ta grupa została utworzona w honorze dla setek tysięcy Tybetańczyków, którzy umierają z rąk Chińskiego rządu.

Este grupo ha sido creado en honor a los cientos de miles
de tibetanos que han muerto a manos del gobierno chino.

Este grupo foi criado em honra das centenas de milhares de tibetanos que morreram nas mãos do governo Chinês.

Ce groupe a été créé en hommage aux centaines de milliers de Tibétains ayant péri à cause du gouvernement chinois.

Questo gruppo è composto in onore di centinaia di migliaia di tibetani che sono morti per mano del governo cinese.

Denne gruppen er laget for å hedre de tusenvis av Tibetanere som har blitt drept av de Kinesiske Styresmaktene.

Эта группа создана в честь сотен тысяч тибетцев
погибших под гнетом китайского правительства.

Deze groep is gemaakt ter ere van de honderdduizenden Tibetanen die zijn overleden in handen van de Chinese regering

Denne gruppe er lavet til ære for de hundrede af tusind tibetaner, som er døde på grund af den kinesiske regering.

Nhóm này được làm trong danh dự (của) hàng trăm hàng nghìn những người Tây tạng mà đã chết tại những bàn tay (của) chính phủ Trung hoa

اعتماد هذه المجموعة على شرف لمئات الالاف من اهالى التبت ان لقوا حتفهم على يد الحكومة الصينية.

Η ομάδα αυτή γίνεται προς τιμήν των εκατοντάδων χιλιάδων Θιβετιανών που πέθαναν στα χέρια της κινεζικής κυβέρνησης.

ito pulutong ay made di parangalan ng ang sandaan ng li Tibetans atipan ng pawid may died at ang makisig ng ang baba pamahalaan.

Тази група е създадена в чест на стотиците хиляди тибетци, загинали под натиска на Китайското правителство.

See grupp on tehtud, et austada tuhandeid tiibetlasi kes on hukkunud Hiina
valitsuse kätetöö pärast.

Acest grup a fost creat in onoarea sutelor de mii de Tibetani care au murit la discretia guvernului Chinez.

Tämä ryhmä on tehty niiden tuhansien Tiibetiläisten muistolle, jotka ovat kuolleet Kiinan hallituksen käsissä.

Оваа група е креирана во чест на стотиците илјади Тибетанци кои загинале од раката на Кинескaтa влада.

Ova grupa je napravjena u čast stotinama i hiljadama Tibetanaca koje je ubila Kineska vlada.

กลุ่มนี้สร้างขึ้นเพื่อระลึกถึงชาวทิเบตนับพันที่ถูกสังหารอย่างโหดร้ายโดยรัฐบาลจีน

Aquest grup ha estat creat en honor als cents de mils de tibetants que han mort a mans del govern xinès.

Þessi grúppa er gerð í minningu þeirra hundruðum þúsunda Tíbeta sem létu lífið af völdum Kínversku ríkisstjórninni.

group.headline: The Official Israeli Black Mesa Group
group.summary:
Watch The HD Trailer: http://www.gametrailers.com/player/usermovies/293049.html?playlist=featured

What tha Hell is Black Mesa!?
Black mesa: Source is a remake of half life (1) with the orange box engine grapichs. with the massive gaming of half life 1 and the grapichs of the orange box we will get one
of the best first person shooter games ever made. As you know half life 1 won twice at 1997 and 1998 as the best game of the year!

Why The game isn't out yet!?
The work on black mesa had started at the end of 2004 and now the work is about to be finished.
With all of the main frame builded by half life 1, there was still a lot of work on the
new models. and the main reason was because half life 1 is a very long game (even more then half life 2).
Another thing thats still delaying the release of the game, is the transformation of the grapichs, when the creators of black mesa has started the work on black mesa they design it to work on the 2004 source engine grapichs, now they have decided to change the graphic engine to the newer source engine (2007). to give us gamers a better graphic experience.

The black Mesa game will contain the full story of half life 1 with the new source models.

When it will be out we will have:
-New maps with the source models that are based exactly on half life 1 maps.
-New improved Weapons that are based on half life 1 weapons.
-Same classic story with massive gameplay addons
-Improved new enemies look (Scientists,Gargantua,Bullsquid,Marines and more...)
-Improved new models (Environment Models and all vehicle models)
-Multiplayer Gaming (dethmatch,team dethmatch)
-co-op story line (you will be able to finish the game with your friends at a public private server)

*Play as Gordon Freeman and survive the attack of the xen and the marines on black mesa science facillity.
if you did not finished half life you must play black mesa when it will be out, if you will not finish black mesa.
dont call yourself a half life addict :)

*For all of the non-half life 1 community who finished only half life 2.
Just know that the main story of city 17 at half life 2 is built on the story of half life 1 (85% of the main ideas of the game story is half life 1)
No wonder you were like WTF is going on !?


Download the HD trailer (Recomended)
http://rapidshare.com/files/13279654/BMSTeaserTrailer.wmv.html

Media And pictures:
Watch this Url to see pictures of the maps, weapons and concepts of the game
http://www.blackmesasource.com/media.php

Download Music and wallpapers:
http://www.blackmesasource.com/downloads.php

Black Mesa... is the real thing when the game will be out we will have the chance to enjoy half life again in better grapichs...

group.headline: For Death Or Glory
group.summary:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Fighting for Death and Show No Mercy to their Enemys.
What do you choose?
Death Or Glory?
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
I am Captain Deathman. Creator of this Steam Group. Since September 13, 2008 I didn't really know what a Steam Group is about. I just created it. These Days I understand the whole thing More and More. A Steam Group is a Community, a Group of Steam Users to communicate and Play together.
( Everyone can Join this Group )

This Group didn't do stuff like that since its born.
maybe we should start with it.
If you want to play stuff like Team Fortress 2 or Left 4 Dead we can talk about it.

Im sure we'll have some fun together. we just have to give it a try.



<3 your Cpt.Deathman.

group.headline: Rest in Peace Michael Jackson
group.summary:
Michael Jackson (1958-2009[Forever in our hears])

Thursday June 25, 2009 Michael Jackson passed away from what is believed to have been a heart attack leading to cardiac arrest.

Michael Jackson will be remembered by most of the world as the King of Pop

Michael Jackson's funeral took place on Tuesday July 7th 2009 where numerous celebrities came to pay their respects and Paris Jackson (Michael Jackson's daughter) talked about Michael Jackson and how he was a great father here is the full speach. "I just wanted to say, ever since I was born, Daddy has been the best father you could ever imagine. And I just wanted to say, I love him so much."

group.headline: TF2 Items!
group.summary: This is a group to brag about your fancy hats. In the future when the trade system will be implemented, you can also arrange trades here :)

group.headline: For those against the item drop system and other atrocities...
group.summary:
This group is also against the general drop system in use. Have a problem with it? Join the Dirty Idlers!

*IMPORTANT NOTICE!*
Let the record show. This group is not against every single wearer of halos...This group is againts what has been put against us and forced us to be branded as "vile cheaters" and such. And of course, we detest the fact that some halo wielders are taking the opportunity to rub it in our faces. So join the group if you wish. But please understand. We don't hate halos. We dislike the way we as a community (the dirty idlers) have been treated with no real warning.

Final Statement regarding the Idler Program...
We used the idler because we did not believe it to be a cheat. We used the idler because we DID want hats, but we couldn't have that opportunity 24/7. So we ended up using it whenever we were busy, AFK, at work or whatnot, when we were asleep. In other words... we used the idler when we could not play tf2. VALVe, however, decides that no matter the circumstances, they will just punish us PERIOD. No warning. No nothing. Just straight up wrath. It is part of the human nature to want such things that make themselves feel special. These hats are a prime example. Some of us in this community that did idle are actually quite avid gamers and fans of tf2. VALVe wanted to get rid of farming for items/achievements. Their answer? The (horrible) new "Random Drops" system and of course: Hats. Since we couldn't farm OR use skill...we had an answer. The Idler. We chose the Idler. That is all...for now....

-Drex

group.headline: An international group that denounces the behaviour of Team Fortress 2 developers towards Idlers!
group.summary:
The purpose of that group is not to form an anti-Halo community, but to denounce the behaviour of Team Fortress 2 developers towards Idlers.

Indeed, the implementation of an unfair drop system in order to obtain hats and weapons is ruining the game. Most of the players do not play more than for this one.

But the worst is to treat the players of cheaters, while they had never been warned that what they made was not authorized.

Then, if as me you idled or that you continue to idle, join this group to express your anger towards Team Fortress 2 developers.

Everybody can join the group: Idlers, non-Idlers, Halo-wearers and more!

To contact us : data@proud-to-idle.com

/!\ Trolls, spam and insults will be deleted without notice! /!\

[Proud To Idle] Servers :
-----------------------------

No servers at the moment. :(

Many thanks to «tCoº» miKe |mtcf, Kallard, [LNS] Yachi and y_3 for their old servers!

- DaTa -

Finally we won! Cheater's Lament for everybody!
No information given.

group.headline: Offical PugGaming public group
group.summary:
This Group will be filled with latest events and contest by PugGaming!

**What is PugGaming?!

PugGaming is a gaming community that strives to provide you the PC gamer with the most fun and best experience you can have while gaming! We do this by offering monthly and weekly events that surround PC gaming! We host Monthly Tournaments with prizes along with weekly "mini events!" We also run a Youtube channel that is growing quickly with over 3k subs and growing daily!
All the latest information can be found on our forums and our website! ( links below)
Also ANYONE can join the community just sign up on our forums and be active!!

We use a voice service called "Mumble" Please download the client and join us! You can get the client here http://mumble.sourceforge.net/
Mumble connect info.
Address: mbl7.gameservers.com
Port: 10073

We currently have 2 Black ops ranked servers can be found under the server names.
PugGaming.net Dallas Mixed
PugGaming.net EU Mixed

group.headline: A recent change in TF2 bans the use of custom player attachments.
group.summary:
Attachments are used by some server plug-ins to create new gameplay modes and ideas.

Plug-ins such as PropHunt, TF2Items, EquipmentManager relied on player attachments in order to become valuable plug-ins to the TF2 Community.

Please invite friends who you think may be concerned about TF2 modifications.

Thanks!

See petition website which is listed below.
A group where TF2 moviemakers can discuss about everything related to tf2 moviemaking.

group.groupName: Pan in Command - Horseless Headless Horsemann Hunting
group.headline: We Kill Horsemenn and Eat Candy (but we're almost entirely out of candy)
group.summary:
IP: 75.127.73.101:27012
Password: alligator7

If I'm not around, follow the rules and try to take turns getting hats in a fair order. Help each other out.

---------------------

This group is for people interested in farming the new Halloween achievements and items.

The server is invite-only - giving out the IP and password without my permission is a big no-no.

All participants must follow the rules at all times. Any violations will result in a ban.

The rules are as follows:
1. Don't cap. Srsly.

2. Don't kill anyone without their permission or invitation.

3a. Players will get the random gift in the order of a queue (based on join time).

3b. If you find the gift after it spawns but it is not your turn in the queue to get it, alert the server as to the location of the gift so that the person whose turn it is may get it.

3c. Taking the gift out of turn will result in a ban.

4a. When the boss spawns, everyone who needs to go ahead and melee him! Everyone who doesn't need the achiev. can help out by weakening him with boolets.

4b. If you don't need the achiev. or items and you see the boss go into his "crouched and dying" pose, STOP SHOOTING HIM. Let those that need it finish him off with their melee.

5. Be nice! Don't be a dink! Listen to me (oranges in game) or be banned.

The server is still being installed, etc.
I will post the info here when I'm ready to start.
It's only a 12-man server for now so hopefully too many people won't be left out in the cold for long.
